verbose_text: Our results, applied to human GI-microbiome data exemplify how this layer of information provides additional insights into treatments ' impact on the GI microbiome, allowing to characterize a more physiologic effects of Prednisone versus Methotrexate, two treatments for rheumatoid arthritis (RA) a complex autoimmune systemic disease.
evidence: impact on the GI microbiome, allowing to characterize a more physiologic effects of Prednisone versus Methotrexate
